Question & Options:
In the 2018 movie 'The Happytime Murders', what is the motive behind the killer targeting the Happytime Gang cast?
Options:
A. To eliminate competition for a new show
B. To receive a larger share of the royalty money when the show becomes syndicated
C. To avenge a past betrayal
D. To steal valuable props from the set
Correct Answer: To receive a larger share of the royalty money when the show becomes syndicated

Question & Options:
In the 2018 movie 'The Happytime Murders', what is the relationship between Mr. Bumblypants and The Happytime Gang?
Options:
A. Mr. Bumblypants is a current member of The Happytime Gang.
B. Mr. Bumblypants was a former cast member of The Happytime Gang.
C. Mr. Bumblypants is the leader of The Happytime Gang.
D. Mr. Bumblypants is a rival of The Happytime Gang.
Correct Answer: Mr. Bumblypants was a former cast member of The Happytime Gang.

Question & Options:
In the 2018 movie 'The Happytime Murders', what role did Phil Phillips hold before being fired?
Options:
A. He was a detective in the LAPD.
B. He was the first puppet cop on the LAPD.
C. He was a chief officer in the LAPD.
D. He was a private investigator.
Correct Answer: He was the first puppet cop on the LAPD.

In the 2018 movie 'The Happytime Murders', what happens after Jenny reveals Sandra's true history?
Options:
A. Jenny and Sandra team up to solve a mystery.
B. Jenny is knocked out by Sandra to take the money for herself.
